title: Biggest scam in the Riot system
body:
A friend of mine had some skins gifted to them from another friend (final boss veigar among them), and the gifter got banned from the game over a transaction dispute, Riot took away my friends skins. In a ticket, my friend requested the skins back but was denied, so currently is asking for Riot to refund RP my friend had used on gifts for his friend..fair request is it not?

I'll update you guys on Riot's reply to this request. But I think the fact they took away the skins in the first place is stupid, and greedy of this piece of crap company.
